title: How meta, blogging about getting the blog blogging
summary: Heh, now I know I'm just blogging out into the ether right now to make sure everything's working, but it amuses me that I'm blogging about getting the blogger blogging. Maybe I should really be writing about this in my personal blog :)
content: Heh, now I know I'm just blogging out into the ether right now to make sure everything's working, but it amuses me that I'm blogging about getting the blogger blogging. Maybe I should really be writing about this in my personal blog :) shortname=ooooag
